problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): I was sitting alone in the cafeteria when a Pakistani guy and a Moldovan guy sat down on either side of me. I had to angle myself towards the Pakistani guy because the other clearly hadn't put on any deodorant that day.
Question: Who does not smell bad?
ans0: Can't be determined
ans1: The Pakistani guy
ans2: The Moldovan guy
